005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
011
012import java.math.BigInteger;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015
016public interface INonNegativeIntegerItem extends IIntegerItem {
017  @SuppressWarnings("null")
018  @NonNull
019  INonNegativeIntegerItem ONE = valueOf(BigInteger.ONE);
020  @SuppressWarnings("null")
021  @NonNull
022  INonNegativeIntegerItem ZERO = valueOf(BigInteger.ZERO);
023
024  /**
025   * Create an item from an existing integer value.
026   *
027   * @param value
028   *          a string representing an integer value
029   * @return the item
030   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
031   *           if the provided value is not a non-negative integer
032   */
033  @NonNull
034  static INonNegativeIntegerItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
035    try {
036      return valueOf(new BigInteger(value));
037    } catch (NumberFormatException ex) {
038      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(null,
039          ex.getMessage(),
040          ex);
041    }
042  }
043
044  /**
045   * Create an item from an existing integer value.
046   *
047   * @param value
048   *          an integer value
049   * @return the item
050   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
051   *           if the provided value is not a non-negative integer
052   */
053  @NonNull
054  static INonNegativeIntegerItem valueOf(@NonNull IIntegerItem value) {
055    return valueOf(value.asInteger());
056  }
057
058  /**
059   * Create an item from an existing integer value.
060   *
061   * @param value
062   *          an integer value
063   * @return the item
064   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
065   *           if the provided value is not a non-negative integer
066   */
067  @SuppressWarnings("null")
068  @NonNull
069  static INonNegativeIntegerItem valueOf(long value) {
070    return valueOf(BigInteger.valueOf(value));
071  }
072
073  /**
074   * Create an item from an existing integer value.
075   *
076   * @param value
077   *          an integer value
078   * @return the item
079   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
080   *           if the provided value is not a non-negative integer
081   */
082  @NonNull
083  static INonNegativeIntegerItem valueOf(@NonNull BigInteger value) {
084    if (value.compareTo(BigInteger.ZERO) < 0) {
085      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
086          null,
087          String.format("Integer value '%s' is negative.", value));
088    }
089    return new NonNegativeIntegerItemImpl(value);
090  }
091
092  /**
093   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
094   *
095   * @param item
096   *          the item to cast
097   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
098   *         cast to this type
099   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
100   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
101   */
102  @NonNull
103  static INonNegativeIntegerItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
104    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.NON_NEGATIVE_INTEGER.cast(item);
105  }
106
107  @Override
108  default INonNegativeIntegerItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
109    return valueOf(cast(item).asInteger());
110  }
111}
